tooltip.warpedmod.magic_mirror.tooltip: Teleports the player to their spawn point
tooltip.warpedmod.magic_mirror.tooltip2: Costs 1 level for every %1$s %2$s, max of %3$s %4$s
tooltip.warpedmod.magic_mirror.tooltip_w: Cannot be used if the player hasn't set their spawn point

info.warpedmod.potion_recall.missing_or_: You tried to remember where home was, but you couldn't quite place it...
info.warpedmod.potion_recall.wrong_dimen: You tried to remember home, but it seemed too far away...
info.warpedmod.potion_discord.failed_tp: You braced yourself, but nothing happened...?
info.warpedmod.mirrors.missing_or_invali: You gazed into the mirror, but there was nothing on the other side...
info.warpedmod.mirrors.wrong_dimension: You gazed into the mirror, but you couldn't see home...
info.warpedmod.mirrors.insufficient_leve: You gazed into the mirror, but the reflection seemed distant...
info.warpedmod.mirrors.use_cancelled_by_: You gazed into the mirror, but your focus was interrupted!
